meta.title: Tbilisi Dub Lab - Supporting Reggae, Dub and Roots Culture in Georgia
meta.description: Non-profit community creating an environment where reggae, dub and roots culture in Georgia can grow, connect and sound louder. Dub Fund supporting musicians.

intro.paragraph1: We are non-profit community who are eager to create the environment where reggae, dub and roots culture in Georgia can grow, connect and sound louder.
intro.paragraph2: We have launched a Dub Fund to support musicians. We have a team of producers who help to prepare releases. And we are opened for new residents and partners.

donation.title: donate
donation.description: Dub Fund collects donations. All collected funds go to finance musicians' rehearsals, sound recording and coverage of activities. We report on the foundation's work once a month.
donation.otherDescription: If you want to donate to us in other ways, including cash or cryptocurrencies, write to

contact.title: contact us
contact.description: We are open to any dialogue. If you are a musician, producer, or just someone who wants to collaborate with us, fill out this form and we will get in touch with you.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about yourself and your ideas...
contact.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.

residents.description: Residents are those whose musical projects and ideas we invest in and support.
residents.callToAction: Want to become a resident? Write to us and we'll discuss your project.

partners.description: Partners are those we collaborate with regularly and create joint projects together.
partners.callToAction: If you have a partnership proposal, write to us.
